query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS company_closures (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  date VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  reason VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  type ENUM('holiday', 'shutdown') DEFAULT 'holiday' NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2VbK495ECNVdRwG.root --database M7yuKMnqbZ6zKJgcZb5X5y --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS company_closures (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  date VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  reason VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  type ENUM('holiday', 'shutdown') DEFAULT 'holiday' NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
